overview: The ice queen has stolen a huge diamond and threatens to freeze the entire city if her ransom isn't payed! Will Jeta, the super-heroine and her mild-mannered reporter alter-ego: Jenna, be able to save the day? Not without a whole lot of sex.
tagline: In the future, anarchy reigns & crime runs rampant. Guess who's gonna take control...
title: Wicked Weapon
